泬字的基本解释

泬
jué
〔泬水〕古河名，即今中国陕西省渭河支流。
水从洞穴中奔泻而出。

泬
xuè
〔泬寥〕空旷清朗，如“泬泬兮天高而气清。”

泬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《集韻》古穴切，入屑，見。］
(1)通“遹”。参见“回泬”。
(2)古水名。潏水的别称。渭河的支流。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·渭水》、《明史·地理志二》。
[②]［xuè］
［《廣韻》呼決切，入屑，曉。］
(1)广阔貌。参见“泬2若”。
(2)见“泬2寥”。

泬字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泬； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页618第09
【唐韻】呼穴切《廣韻》《集韻》《韻會》《正韻》?呼決切。音血。《說文》水從孔穴疾出也。　又回泬，邪僻也。與回遹同。【潘岳·西征賦】事回泬而好還。 又泬寥，空貌。【楚辭·九辯】泬寥兮天高而氣淸。又【集韻】古穴切，與潏同水名。《水經》作沈水。【顏師古·漢書註】泬，卽今沈水。本作泬，與沈相似，因名沈水。

考證：〔【唐韻】呼穴切，【集韻】古穴切，?音玦。【說文】水從孔穴疾出也。 又水名。水經作沈水。【顏師古·漢書註】泬，卽今沈水。本作泬，與沈相似，因名沈水。〕　〔又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?呼決切，音血。泬寥，空貌。【楚辭·九辯】泬寥兮天高而氣淸。〕　謹按呼穴切與呼決切同，與古穴切異，前後援引譌誤，今謹改爲廣韻集韻韻會正韻?呼決切。音血。說文水從孔穴疾出也。〔又回泬，邪僻也。與回遹同。【潘岳·西征賦】事回泬而好還。 又泬寥，空貌。【楚辭·九辯】泬寥兮天高而氣淸。〕〔又【集韻】古穴切，與潏同水名。水經作沈水。【顏師
泬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泬字的起名意思

暂无。

Yang
Basic explanation of words
Yang
jué
〔泬水〕The name of the ancient river is the current tributary of the Weihe River in Shaanxi Province, China.
Water rushed out of the cave.
Yang
xuè
〔Liao Lio〕 is empty and clear, such as "The sky is high and the air is clear."
Yang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Jiyun" ancient acupoint cut, into the scraps, see. ]
(1) Through "遹". See "Hui Liao".
(2) Ancient water names. Another name for 潏水. A tributary of the Weihe River. Refer to Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty, "Shui Jing Zhu · Wei Shui", "Ming Dynasty History · Geography II".
[②]［xuè］
["Guangyun" call for a decisive cut, into the crumbs, Xiao. ]
(1) Broad appearance. See "Liao 2 Ruo".
(2) See "Liao 2 Liao".
Yang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泬; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 618 09
[Tang Yun] Huxueqie, "Guangyun", "Jiyun", "Yunhui", "Zhengyun"? Hujueqie. Tone blood. "Shuowen" water rushes out of the holes.　Back again, evil too. Same as Huiyao. [Pan Yue·Xi Zheng Fu] Things are back and good. It's lonely and empty. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Debates] The sky is high and angry. Also 【Jiyun】An ancient acupoint cut, with the same name as the water. "Shui Jing" is submerged in water. [Annotation to Yan Shigu·Han Shu] 泬，卽 Today is submerged in water. This work is 泬, similar to Shen, because of the name Shenshui. Textual research: [[Tang Yun] Hu acupoint cutting, [Jiyun] ancient acupoint cutting,? Yin Jue. [Said Wen] Water rushes out of the holes. Also known as water. The water classics are submerged. [Annotation to Yan Shigu·Han Shu] 泬，卽 Today is submerged in water. This work is 泬, similar to Shen, because of the name Shenshui. 〕　〔And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Call for determination, sound and blood. Liao, empty appearance. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Debates] The sky is high and angry. 〔〕 　 I would like to press the Hu acupoint and Hujue to be the same, but different from the ancient acupuncture points, quoting the mistakes before and after, now I would like to change to Guangyun Ji Yunyunhui Zhengyun? Tone blood. It is said that Wenshui rushes out of the holes. 〔Back again, evil and secluded. Same as Huiyao. [Pan Yue·Xi Zheng Fu] Things are back and good. It's lonely and empty. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Debates] The sky is high and angry. 〕〔Also 【Jiyun】Ancient acupoint cut, with the same name as the water. The water classics are submerged. 【Yan Shi

Name meaning
Nothing.
jué, [c][i]в, coчeт., тakжe[/c], [c][/i][/c]xuè
I гл.
1) бить ключом (из отверстия)
2) извиваться, петлять; отклоняться; извилина; вираж; отклонение
II прил.
неправильный; еретический; злой
洄泬 противный и еретический
III собств.
ист., геогр. Цзюэ (река на террит. нынешней пров. Шаньси)
